summary: This mod adds three alternate Stormcloak Armors to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[size=-1][b]Version:[/b] v2.1
[b]Date:[/b] 07/14/2013
[b]Author:[/b] lifestorock
[b]Requirement:[/b] needs at least v. 1.9.32.0.8 of the game[/size]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/12681/?]A Version for the Skyrim Special Edition can be found here![/url]

[line]

[size=+1][color=A52A2A][b]Description:[/b][/color][/size]
This mod adds several alternate Stormcloak cuirasses and armor pieces to the game:

[list]
[*]Studded Texture Variant
[*]Chainmail Texture Variant
[*]Stormcloak Cuirass with Sleeves
[*]Stormcloak Cuirass with Iron Pauldron
[*]Stormcloak Cuirass with Steel Pauldron
[*]Iron, Leather & Plate Boot Variants
[*]Iron, Leather & Plate Variants
[/list]

All armor pieces have a male and female version. In addition to that, do they own a unique inventory & ground model. They can be created at a forge and are temperable.
The base body is the normal vanilla body. I won't to any patches for the different body mods out there.

Ingame Stormcloak Soldiers have also a chance to wear this armor instead of the vanilla armor.

[size=+1][color=A52A2A][b]Installation:[/b][/color][/size]

The mod archive contains an ESP- and BSA a file. Use a mod-manager of your choice to install these files or simply paste them in Skyrim's "Data" folder.
If installing this mod into an existing savegame, don't forget to wait or sleep for 31 days. This is needed to make everything available immediately.

For compatibility with other mods I recommend to use Wrye Bash and create a Bashed Patch. I only edited three vanilla level lists & two Stormcloak Outfit lists to distribute the armors.
[line]

[size=+1][color=A52A2A][b]Credits:[/b][/color][/size]
edwardvlad for the male body mesh and base textures - released as texture replacer under:[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6024]Skyrim Stormcloaks Enhanced[/url]

[b]Permission Note:[/b]
You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of this mod. My mod also contains assets released by other authors (take a look at the Credits). Permission for using this files must be obtained separately from the original author of the assets you want to use.

[center][size=+1][color=#ff0000][b]Under all circumstances any upload or re-upload to any other download site than the ones provided as authorized mirrors is explicitly forbidden![/b][/color][/size][/center]
author: lifestorock

files.name: Extended Stormcloak Armor Variety v2_1
files.changelogHtml: added "Fur Iron Gauntlets" and "Fur Leather Boots"
